'''Colombo Hornblower''' was one of the recipients of [[Bilbo]]'s gifts (a barometer) during his birthday party, in the drafts for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{RS|1Iiii}}, p. 33</ref> His name was initially ''Cosimo Chubb'', before he ultimately became a [[Hornblower]].<ref>{{RS|1Iiv}}, p. 38</ref>
